string.value: #b#@1072008:##k in #bNautilus#k says she has a favor to request of you. Let's talk to her.

She says there are too many #rRibbon Pigs#k near the ship, which makes loading and unloading difficult for the passengers. She would like you to hunt the #rRibbon Pigs#k.\nYou can easily find them in #b#m100030000##k.

#b#@1072008:##k in #bNautilus#k says there was something very valuable amongst the things she's lost. She says to go talk to #b#@1092002:##k in #bNautilus#k, but there is also something you need to do first.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 3,500 Able to proceed to 'Baine Likes...' as next quest.

So, did you get to look around at all? There has been a huge increase in the #rRibbon Pig#k population. Even just a few days ago, I was trying to unload my things from the ship and the #rRibbon Pigs#k came and caused a ruckus. Thanks to that, I lost some of my luggage.\n\nSo I was wondering if you could help me hunt some of those #rRibbon Pigs#k.
You're very generous.\nPlease hunt 30 #rRibbon Pigs#k.\nYou'll be able to find a lot of them in #b#m100030000##k.
I heard you're the type who can't say 'no' to people. I guess I was mistaken.
Have you finished hunting them already? No wonder I stopped hearing the 'oinking' noises. Haha...thanks!
Ah, my life has gotten a lot easier with your help. I can easily load and unload my luggage without having to worry about those Ribbon Pigs. Thank you.\nBut I have one more favor...
You must hunt 30 #rRibbon Pigs#k. Keep at it!
